lead_paragraph: Once famous mobile phones such as Nokia's classic 3310 from the turn of the century have been given a new lease of life as Chinese manufacturers revive Western brands to get an edge in an increasingly cut-throat handset market.
snippet: Once famous mobile phones such as Nokia's classic 3310 from the turn of the century have been given a new lease of life as Chinese manufacturers revive Western brands to get an edge in an increasingly cut-throat handset market....

headline.main: Vintage Western Phone Brands Resurrected by Chinese Players
headline.print_headline: Vintage Western Phone Brands Resurrected by Chinese Players
